data.message: Removing the Facebook Groups app really sucks!

replies.message: Hey Joakim! We appreciate the feedback. Feel free to share more with our team here: http://bit.ly/2h3umUk. Thanks! -Caitlin

I'm trying to link an Instagram account with a facebook page, via FACEBOOK PAGE SETTINGS. It keeps saying 'This Instagram account is already connected to a Facebook PagE' but I'M VERY MUCH SURE IT IS NOT CONNECTED TO ANY FACEBOOK PAGE, as i personally unlinked it from any facebook page (business page or default, personal account) via INSTAGRAM/SETTINGS/LINKED ACCOUNTS. Please i need assistance with this as a client is waiting on me urgently.
